newsitem.title: INDIA: India's M3 money supply growth rises to 16.4 pct.
newsitem.headline: India's M3 money supply growth rises to 16.4 pct.

text.p: India's year-on-year M3 money supply growth rose to 16.4 percent on November 8 from 15.1 percent a fortnight ago, the Reserve Bank of India (RBI) said in its weekly statistical supplement on Saturday.
M3 MONEY SUPPLY GROWTH (yr-on-yr in pct)
Money supply was 6,547.11 billion rupees on November 8 compared to 6,465.49 billion rupees on October 25, 1996 and 5,609.76 billion on November 10, 1995, the RBI said.
